name: Mannekkin
description:
You're playing league and the power goes down. To avoid getting banned for afk you have to get the power back on as soon as you can.

To get the power back on you have to get all the way down to the basement and find the switchboard so that you can turn your pc back on. But, some obstacles might come in the way between you and your game.

-Controls-

Move [WASD]

Interact [E]

Flick light [Leftclick]

Options [Esc]
